title: Google Stock Joins IBD's Long-Term Leaders
summary:
This week we found three new names, including Google stock, to add to IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio and Watchlist.
XGoogle Stock Forms First-Stage Cup BaseGoogle-parent Alphabet (GOOGL) joins IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a cup-without-handle base.
IDXX stock joins Google stock on IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a first-stage cup-with-handle.
Along with GOOGL stock and IDXX stock, WST stock becomes the third member added to IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist this week.
IBD's Long-Term Leaders PortfolioMany of IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio stocks are already actionable.
text:
This powerful bull market tested the 21-day moving average and we continued to expand our watchlist. This week we found three new names, including Google stock, to add to IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio and Watchlist.

X

Google Stock Forms First-Stage Cup Base

Google-parent Alphabet (GOOGL) joins IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a cup-without-handle base. The base is 34% deep and 13-weeks long with a 1530.84 buy point. One could make the case that this week tacked on a one-week handle to make it a cup-with-handle base. That gives an earlier entry for Google stock at 1415.63.

While Alphabet is most well known for its dominant Google online search, it is diversifying as expressed by the name change. YouTube is almost as well known as the Google search engine. Alphabet also has a huge stake in the cloud and is making a big bet in self-driving with its Waymo division.

Idexx Laboratories Joins Long-Term Leaders Watchlist

Idexx Laboratories (IDXX) develops and manufactures diagnostic products and services for the veterinary market. The vast majority of its revenue comes from pets, the remainder from livestock and dairy.

IDXX stock joins Google stock on IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a first-stage cup-with-handle. The base for Idexx stock is on the deep side at 43%, but it is still in the buy zone from the 289 pivot. Its Composite Rating is currently at 97, on a 1-99 scale with 99 tops, and its relative strength line is at all-time highs.

West Pharmaceutical Services Shows Its Power

West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) increased 20% within 10 days after breaking out of a first-stage cup with handle. At 38 days, it was just long enough to qualify and the 30% depth was less than the correction of the S&P 500.

The relative strength line for WST stock continues to hit all-time highs week after week. This maker of components and systems for injectable drug delivery and packaging is in a highly desirable space.

Along with GOOGL stock and IDXX stock, WST stock becomes the third member added to IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist this week.

IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio

Many of IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio stocks are already actionable. We still recommend to keep positions at half size. This means 2.5% versus the full position of 5%. We may increase that to full size early next week.

When any of IBD's Long-Term Leaders present proper entry points, we will highlight them here and on IBD Live.

Mike Webster is IBD's Head Market Strategist. Follow Mike on Twitter @mwebster1971 for insights and updates on the stock market nearly 24 hours a day. Really.

<article class="clearfix post-5822609 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-research tag-fang-stock-news tag-google tag-google-stock-news tag-ibd-long-term-leaders prim_stock_symbol-goog prim_stock_symbol-googl prim_stock_symbol-idxx prim_stock_symbol-wst article_type-staffarticle distribution_rights-distribute">

<ul class="post-categories">
<li><a href="https://www.investors.com/category/research/" rel="category tag">Research</a></li></ul> <h1 class="header1">
Google Stock And Two Others Join IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist	</h1>
<div class="featured-post-image-container"></div>
<div class="addtoany_share_save_container addtoany_content_top row">
<div class="share">
<div class="a2a_kit a2a_kit_size_25 addtoany_list" data-a2a-url="https://www.investors.com/research/google-stock-two-others-join-ibd-long-term-leaders-watchlist/" data-a2a-title="Google Stock And Two Others Join IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist"><a class="a2a_button_facebook" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/facebook?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fgoogle-stock-two-others-join-ibd-long-term-leaders-watchlist%2F&linkname=Google%20Stock%20And%20Two%20Others%20Join%20IBD%27s%20Long-Term%20Leaders%20Watchlist" title="Facebook" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/facebook.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Facebook"></a><a class="a2a_button_twitter" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/twitter?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fgoogle-stock-two-others-join-ibd-long-term-leaders-watchlist%2F&linkname=Google%20Stock%20And%20Two%20Others%20Join%20IBD%27s%20Long-Term%20Leaders%20Watchlist" title="Twitter" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/twitter.png" width="25" height="25" alt="Twitter"></a><a class="a2a_button_linkedin" href="https://www.addtoany.com/add_to/linkedin?linkurl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.investors.com%2Fresearch%2Fgoogle-stock-two-others-join-ibd-long-term-leaders-watchlist%2F&linkname=Google%20Stock%20And%20Two%20Others%20Join%20IBD%27s%20Long-Term%20Leaders%20Watchlist" title="LinkedIn" rel="nofollow noopener" target="_blank"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/linkedin.png" width="25" height="25" alt="LinkedIn"></a><a class="a2a_dd addtoany_share_save addtoany_share" href="https://www.addtoany.com/share"><img src="/wp-content/themes/ibd/dist/images/share-icons/email.png" alt="Share"></a></div> <a class="reprints-button sharing" href="https://www.ibdlicensing.com" target="_blank">Licensing</a>
</div>
<ul class="post-meta">
<li><span class="authors-links"><a href="https://www.investors.com/author/websterm/" title="Posts by MIKE WEBSTER" class="author url fn" rel="author">MIKE WEBSTER</a></span></li>
<li class="post-time">05:48 PM ET 05/15/2020</li>
</ul>
</div>
</header>
<div class="single-post-content post-content drop-cap">
<p>This powerful bull market tested the 21-day moving average and we continued to expand our watchlist. This week we found three new names, including Google stock, to add to<a href="https://www.investors.com/research/best-long-term-stocks/"> IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio and Watchlist</a>.</p>
<span>
<span style="width:50%;" class="video-player-container vms-left">
<span class="shortcode-video" vid-id="5649245" vid-dom-id="5649245-5ec4958cb282c" vid-top="false" vid-repeat="1" vid-width="50" vid-url="https://content.jwplatform.com/manifests/awlRxFxU.m3u8" data-captions="[{"name":"English","url":"https:\/\/content.jwplatform.com\/tracks\/Gzddhnw9"}]" vid-name="Mike Webster: DocuSign Leads Top Stocks As Coronavirus Stock Market Attempts A Rally" vid-cat="Investing Podcast" vid-date="03/26/2020" vid-image="https://www.investors.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/awlRxFxU-640x360.jpg" vid-authors="IBD VIDEOS">
<span class="close-mini-vid">X</span>
<span id="shortcode-video-player-5649245-5ec4958cb282c" class="ready-to-load"></span>
</span>
</span>
</span><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https:\/\/schema.org","@type":"VideoObject","name":"Mike Webster: DocuSign Leads Top Stocks As Coronavirus Stock Market Attempts A Rally","description":"Mike Webster, IBD's Head Market Strategist, is back on the podcast this week to continue his review of charts in previous bear markets to help investors identify characteristics of a strong follow-through day. Plus, we look at three potential stocks that are bucking the coronavirus correction trend: Atlassian Corp., Cloudflare and DocuSign.","thumbnailUrl":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2020\/03\/awlRxFxU-640x360.jpg","contentUrl":"https:\/\/content.jwplatform.com\/manifests\/awlRxFxU.m3u8","uploadDate":"2020-03-26T15:35:43+0000","duration":"PT4255.09S","author":"IBD VIDEOS","publisher":{"@type":"Organization","name":"Investor's Business Daily","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com\/wp-content\/uploads\/2018\/09\/ibd-logo.png"},"url":"https:\/\/www.investors.com"},"keywords":""}</script>
<h2>Google Stock Forms First-Stage Cup Base</h2>
<div class="small-12 columns "><div class='ibd-chart-container' style='position:relative;width:100%;height:462px;overflow:hidden;'><iframe class='ibd-chart-frame' style='position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:99.9%;height:100%;' frameborder='0' src='https://research.investors.com/ibdchartswp.aspx?cht=pvc&type=weekly&symbol=GOOGL'></iframe></div></div>
<p>Google-parent <strong>Alphabet</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=GOOGL' target='_blank'>GOOGL</a>) joins IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/investing-202-why-some-great-cup-bases-dont-form-a-handle/">cup-without-handle base.</a> The base is 34% deep and 13-weeks long with a 1530.84 buy point. One could make the case that this week tacked on a one-week handle to make it a <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/the-basics-how-to-analyze-a-stocks-cup-with-handle/">cup-with-handle base</a>. That gives an earlier entry for Google stock at 1415.63.</p>
<p>While Alphabet is most well known for its dominant Google online search, it is diversifying as expressed by the name change. YouTube is almost as well known as the Google search engine. Alphabet also has a huge stake in the cloud and is making a big bet in self-driving with its Waymo division.</p>
<h2>Idexx Laboratories Joins Long-Term Leaders Watchlist</h2>
<div class="small-12 columns "><div class='ibd-chart-container' style='position:relative;width:100%;height:462px;overflow:hidden;'><iframe class='ibd-chart-frame' style='position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:99.9%;height:100%;' frameborder='0' src='https://research.investors.com/ibdchartswp.aspx?cht=pvc&type=weekly&symbol=idxx'></iframe></div></div>
<p><strong>Idexx Laboratories</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=IDXX' target='_blank'>IDXX</a>) develops and manufactures diagnostic products and services for the veterinary market. The vast majority of its revenue comes from pets, the remainder from livestock and dairy.</p>
<p>IDXX stock joins Google stock on IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist after forming a first-stage cup-with-handle. The base for Idexx stock is on the deep side at 43%, but it is still in the buy zone from the 289 pivot. Its <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/how-to-research-growth-stocks/">Composite Rating</a> is currently at 97, on a 1-99 scale with 99 tops, and its <a href="https://www.investors.com/how-to-invest/investors-corner/a-stock-breakout-specialty-tool-the-relative-strength-line/">relative strength line</a> is at all-time highs.</p>
<h2>West Pharmaceutical Services Shows Its Power</h2>
<div class="small-12 columns "><div class='ibd-chart-container' style='position:relative;width:100%;height:462px;overflow:hidden;'><iframe class='ibd-chart-frame' style='position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:99.9%;height:100%;' frameborder='0' src='https://research.investors.com/ibdchartswp.aspx?cht=pvc&type=weekly&symbol=wst'></iframe></div></div>
<p><strong>West Pharmaceutical Services</strong> (<a class='ticker' href='https://research.investors.com/quote.aspx?symbol=WST' target='_blank'>WST</a>) increased 20% within 10 days after breaking out of a first-stage cup with handle. At 38 days, it was just long enough to qualify and the 30% depth was less than the correction of the S&P 500.</p>
<p>The relative strength line for WST stock continues to hit all-time highs week after week. This maker of components and systems for injectable drug delivery and packaging is in a highly desirable space.</p>
<p>Along with GOOGL stock and IDXX stock, WST stock becomes the third member added to IBD's Long-Term Leaders Watchlist this week.</p>
<h2>IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio</h2>
<p>Many of IBD's Long-Term Leaders Portfolio stocks are already actionable. We still recommend to keep positions at half size. This means 2.5% versus the full position of 5%. We may increase that to full size early next week.</p>
<p>When any of IBD's Long-Term Leaders present proper entry points, we will highlight them here and on <a href="https://shop.investors.com/offer/splashresponsive.aspx?id=IBD-Live&src=A00433A&refcode=pdsoc%7Cggl%7Cibdlive%7C2019%7C11%7Cibdlive%7Cna%7C985802&intcode=invstcntnartcls%7Ccms%7Cibdlive%7C2019%7C11%7Cibdlive%7Cna%7C682843">IBD Live</a>.</p>
<p><em>Mike Webster is IBD's Head Market Strategist. Follow Mike on Twitter <a href="https://twitter.com/mwebster1971">@mwebster1971</a> for insights and updates on the stock market nearly 24 hours a day. Really.</em></p>

</div>
